channel.title: Disruptive Innovation on
channel.description: Recent content in Disruptive Innovation on

item.title: Blowfish tutorial Series
item.author: wamuchiecolette@gmail.com (Colette Muiruri)
item.description: Nintendo achieved something truly amazing with the launch of the Switch. It was able to disrupt itself and the entire gaming industry while saving itself from doom. How exactly was Nintendo able to do it and what comes next in that story?
